question: Name an ATAK plugin Aurora uses.
What are the different types of tasks Aurora can execute?

options.A: Waypoint task  random waypoint task  loiter task  random walk task  station task.

question: What is Waypoint Task?

options.D: The vehicle will travel to the given waypoint.

question: What is Random Waypoint Task?

options.A: The vehicle will travel to a random waypoint contained within a circle specified by the radius and centered around the given waypoint.

question: What is Liter Task?

options.B: The vehicle will travel to  and circle a given waypoint at the distance specified by radius. The task will continue until the set duration time has been reached.

question: What is the Random Walk Task?

options.D: The vehicle will travel to random waypoints contained within a circle specified by the radius and centered around the given waypoint. The task will continue until the set duration time has been reached.

question: What is Station Task?

options.A: The vehicle will drift until the vehicle reaches the edge of a circle specified by the radius and centered around the vehicle current location. When the vehicle reaches the edge of the circle  it will then travel back to the location at which the task was started. The task will continue until the set duration time has been reached and the provided time stamp has elapsed.
